function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Difference between estimated covid-19 trend and actual trend in Wuhan","category":"Global cooperation not comprehensive due to government reluctance or lack of resources","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difference between population distribution and actual situation","category":"Global coordination challenges","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of drone technology for crowd surveillance leading to privacy concerns and potential civil rights violations","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of drones for surveillance and crowd monitoring","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of drones for crowd surveillance and disinfection","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of clear government regulatory policies for integrating UAVs in the COVID-19 impact response system","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sharing verified health and location information among individuals, authorities, and hospitals","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of GIS data for COVID-19 mapping","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Propagation of fake news and misinformation related to COVID-19","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Non-compliance with lockdown measures","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible transmission of SARS-CoV-2 across countries through air travel","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Differences in the transmission potential of SARS-CoV-2 within a country due to vehicle concentration and urbanization","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disagreements between reviewers may result in delays and errors in data inaccurate predictions and diagnoses.","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Temporary regulations in public places","category":"Lack of global governance and coordination","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resistance to adaptive measures due to privacy concerns","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Divergence in opinions of different groups of experts","category":"Lack of global governance and coordination","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Convergence without consensus","category":"Lack of global governance and coordination","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of the expert-led approach for selection and identification","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Rapid spread of contagious diseases due to sudden policy changes impacting built environment development.","category":"Lack of coordination and consistency in mitigation measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapidly evolving crisis","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective and unsustainable mitigation strategies in
